Blog - page 61

  1. 164/365: Turkish delight

    30.06.2011

    Taken at this week's Birmingham International Food Fair.

    I didn't eat any of it. I had it when I was a kid and I remember it tasting awful, plus I'm not sure if it's vegetarian-friendly. Probably not.

  2. 163/365: Partay

    30.06.2011

    Your wife is away for the weekend. What do you do?

    Me? I put the old rabbit cage outside in the rain and take pictures of it.

  3. 162/365: Flyin' Ryan

    30.06.2011

    This is Flyin' Ryan, a motorcycle stunt man, at a show he was doing in Redditch. My Dad had lent me his telephoto lens, which turned out to be quite useful because they had set up safety barriers really far away from the ramp. It wasn't easy, partially because the lens is manual focus only, but I got these 2 that I was quite pleased with.

  6. 159/365: Dry flower

    22.06.2011

    Another close-up of one of Steph's Birthday flowers.
